body:
`configMapName` is the empty string `""` by default and it breaks `allPossibleMigStrategiesAreNone` function with default values.

See https://github.com/NVIDIA/k8s-device-plugin/issues/670 for details.

Thanks @jakubkrzykowski. These look good now.

I rebased and incorporated the changes from #749
having problems with this using the built in config.map option - since a configMapName is set it immediately goes to `$result = false` instead of falling through to evaluate the config.map profiles
